reviews.review:
I can't see why everyone complains NOW,
At first yes, this game was a bit bad but they've updated it multiple times since in an attempt to improve and they done that.
Since the last update, I have not come accross any issues what so ever, game runs perfectly, no crashes, no bugs etc. 
Every game I play loads perfectly fine, no lobby kicks, no restarts, no "lobby simulator" or "loading simulator".

However, there is a minor bug where the mouse doesn't work but that is the easiest thing to fix, simply start walking and look left and right (with the arrow keys) and then try with mouse and it works.

I would highly reccomend this game to anyone because of how unique, endulging and scary the game is. If you are looking at buying this YOU SHOULD.

[spoiler]Don't be one of those kids that calls a killer a camper when they're on the other side of hte map.[/spoiler]

No recomendado. Se estan cargando poco a poco el juego; ademas de los bugs y las colas para poder jugar, actualmente, esta la moda de que el killer y el survivor entren en "team" en partida, no dejando jugar a los demas jugadores y cargandose el espiritu del juego; otra cosa esta en la forma de jugar de los asesinos: los "camper", es un modo de jugar si, pero si eres survivor y te hacen un facecamp o un campeo " en la zona" arruina totalmente tu partida, sin poder jugar ni hacer nada. Sin lugar a dudas ahora no lo recomiendo, ademas de que parece que los propios desarrolladores de este les importe mas sacar dlcs y no arreglar los problemas con la jubabilidad del juego.

Dead by Daylight √© um asymmetrical multiplayer, na qual um assassino ca√ßa 4 sobreviventes para sacrific√°-los para a Entidade.O lan√ßamento do jogo foi bem bugado, o jogo possu√≠a diversos bugs e problemas com a conex√£o nos lobbys, mas hoje em dia os bugs diminuiram muito e as Dlcs s√£o justas, por√©m todo jogo tem defeitos e os defeitos de Dead by Daylight s√£o a conex√£o com os lobbys que caem diversas vezes e a comunidade do jogo √© t√≥xica, pois os desenvolvedores n√£o possuem muita no√ß√£o de balanceamento e a cada Patch e Update algo fica buffado demais ou muito nerfado.

Yes, there are some bugs, yes, there are some balancing issues, and yes, all of this is getting better and worse all the time as time goes by, new fixes come, and new content is being published.

Nevertheless, I'm having tons of fun with this game. There are four survivors who have to repair generators, until they can open electrically powered gates to escape the level. Before that happens, the fifth player, a killer, has to find the survivors and kill them. Both survivors and killers have abilities that help them on their endeavour. Also, there are advanced tactics for both sides to really mess with the others to a point where you can take the fun out of the game.

I play both sides, and even with recent content updates which seem to push the game really to the survivor's side I get fun games. There is a ranking system, and even with high rank players you never know what happens. It's definitely not as one-sided as many people try to make you believe these days. Sure there are some rounds which just screw me over really hard and I barely get anything done, but for the most part I get nice matches.

If you like tense games I really encourage you to play Dead by Daylight. You will face a lot of losses, but given that you learn and adapt to the game you also get really awesome wins.
If u have a friend and u want to play a cooperative game with him, this game is what u are searching for, but at the moment it is pretty buggy and I recommend u to wait until someone will fix that
This game is very buggy.You have to think again to play this game.Nerf survivor all ways so they can't survive.One bug has to take a long and long time to fix it

This game looks good but I assure you it is total garbage!

Accurrate reviews I have seen. Lobby Simulator 2k17 but I have a new one.....Never Ending Chase Simulator 2k17.

You get to be a killer but you do not really kill anyone; you put them on hooks and the other players just take them right back off......just an annoying experience of exploits. 

Since I purchased it on a 50% off sale I got a few fun matches but once all the new players left I soon found out why the wait times are ridiculous.....bc no one wants to be a killer so you have huge quenes of survivors and no killers. 

To make things worse the only way to be effective in killing anyone you have to tightly patrol the hooks you put people on which they have to stay on for a certain amount of time to die........which will get you hazed in the after game chat. 

Other than the visuals and a few good matches the only thing this experience was good for was seeing what other games people recommend instead of this heaping pile of elephant dung. 

Which is terrible since they would most likely sell a lot of DLC if it didn't suck. All in all meh, spent $12 got $5 worth of game so I can feel good knowing I only lost $7.

oh, forgot the non-esistant Match Maker so you will get paired against people who have hundreds of hours of gameplay and unlocks which I can't fathom why they hate themselves enough for that level of self-punishment. 

Honestly, the game would be 1000% better with an offline mode or PVE mode with bots that don't cheat. I mean it will have to be a PVE at some point bc no one wants to be a killer and for good reason. 

If it were done right this game would be epicly entertaining but it's utter rubbish!

This game have seen significant improvement from it's early access days (2016), with changes being done to it's gamplay, character/in-game detail, bugs and etc. With new characters coming out every quarter of the year, the potential for this game is immense. However, there is still much to be done for the other areas, such as the leveling system, where you would just hit a plateau in your progress after spending considerable time on a character. Servers can also be worked on to.

Such a good game for $19.99! Very straighforward and fun game that gives ton of replayability to it. Playing as Michael Myers is so AWEsome. Just make sure you get Laurie Strode if you play as him, or else!

Purchased this game despite the many reviews stating there were many bugs and connecting issues. My friends and I wanted to give this game the benefit of the doubt as it looked great. Unfortunately the many complaints are warranted and joining is next to impossible if joining with a friend. Was almost a different issue each time. 

It`s unfortunate, because the game itself seems like a lot of fun when I actually could join. All this however doesn`t matter if you can`t play a multi game ONLINE... 

My friends and I all issued a refund unfortunately. We won`t consider this game again unless reviews have shown that the bugs and joining issues have all been fixed.

Even though this game is a little buggie and sometimes when you join a lobby it kicks you it is still over all a good game and i recomend you get it it is very fun to play with your friends and even to play by your self.

This game is awful. I quit playing a couple years ago, and every once in a while I load it up because of how much fun I used to have, and I immediately realize why I quit playing again. The devs have created an extremely toxic community, and they enable and even promote and reward players for playing toxic. The game has been changed in such a way that it's no longer fun at all. Anytime I see a video of someone playing killer the only thing they care about is getting a 4K at any cost, and it's commonplace for all killers to resort to toxic gameplay, and they attack anyone who dares challenge their gameplay. It goes both ways. The game is unbearable at this point. When I play killer, I patrol my gens, and I always find survivors because they are trying to do gens. If I lose my gens, I lose the game as killer. I generally get a 4K when playing killer and don't have to resort to scummy play. The same goes for survivor play, but I just don't care about this game enough anymore to leave a more detailed review. This game is a massive disapointment plagued by lazy developers that have curated a toxic community.
